get.description: Perform the query on all log data

parameters.name: anchorId
parameters.description: Is the id of an entry from where start the search

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Only include entries after this date. Defaults to current time.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Only include entries before this date. If not supplied, then does not apply any filter

parameters.name: contextSize
parameters.description: Include this number of entries before the startDate (used for highlighting entries)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number the number of entries after the start date.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Typical search functionality

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Only include entries that use one of these tags

parameters.name: logbooks
parameters.description: Only include entries that belong to one of these logbooks

parameters.name: sortByLogDate
parameters.description: Sort entries by log date instead event date

parameters.name: hideSummaries
parameters.description: Hide the summaries from the search(default is false)

parameters.name: requireAllTags
parameters.description: Require that all entries found includes all the tags

parameters.name: originId
parameters.description: Is the origin id of the source system record identification
